pr_title: OAuth Scim Service - /consent endpoint implementation with integration tests

timeline.message:
/consent endpoint implementation with integration tests

1. /consent endpoint implementation with integration tests
2. Added @Transaction annotation to methods in service classes
3. Removed duplicate dependency for commons-lang3
4. Implemented scheduler task to remove expired temp_reg_id's

added activation redirect url with integration tests

added activation redirect url with integration tests

timeline.bodyText:
is this to be replaced with login URl?
if yes, please add appropriate TODO
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: no, we've two views : login and signin. login view displays email & password fields whereas signin page displays please wait message.
replies.author: dhanyak-btc

replies.bodyText: can we rename the wait page to make the difference more clear?
replies.author: zohrehj

timeline.bodyText: should be moved to the orgID PR, does not belong here
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: Yes, Org ID removed in PR 650 but forgot to remove this unused field. I noticed this in this PR hence removed.
replies.author: dhanyak-btc

replies.bodyText: so why is it in this PR?
replies.author: zohrehj

timeline.bodyText: please move the numerical values to the top of the class and make into constant

timeline.bodyText: please rename to removeTempRegIdBeforeTime or other descriptive name

replies.bodyText: Yes, I checked accepted answer in SO post Delete cookie from a servlet response
replies.author: dhanyak-btc

timeline.bodyText: do we need to add a common prefix to create a more identifiable cookieName?
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: not sure that makes any difference, but prefix can be added. I'm thinking to add mystudies_ prefix. Please suggest a prefix for cookies.
replies.author: dhanyak-btc

replies.bodyText: mystudies_ sounds like a good one for now.
replies.author: zohrehj

timeline.bodyText: This code is getting duplicated, please move to one place.

timeline.bodyText: is "consent" another yet to be added URL? if yes, then please mark it in the code accordingly.

replies.bodyText: This is a view name, it should be same as the template name i.e. consent.html

timeline.bodyText:
There are a few new app params being added via this PR, this expiry time, app redirection URls etc.
Please file a bug and list these values and others (if there are more) to flag that they need to be accounted for in the documentation and deployment.
timeline.author: zohrehj

timeline.bodyText: Please add a db failure test to the controller methods that calls these, and verify that the all actions are getting rolled back properly and correct error response is returned.
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: Audit Log Fallback option is removed in PR #592 this method will be removed when the branch is updated.
